BuildType.Name: Perl Script
BuildType.Description: Will execute a set of Perl scripts listed as dependencies in the Target file. The order that the scripts will be executed is random. If a particular order is required, a "driver" Perl script should be used as the single dependency in the Target that includes the list of Perl script to execute in the correct execution order.

BuildTasks.Name: Compile and Link
BuildTasks.Description: This Build Task links compiled objects together into a runtime or library file.
